# 美家行业消费者资产化解决方案白皮书

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/meijia-xingye-xiaofeizhe-zichan-hua-jiejuefangan-baipishu
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/meijia-xingye-xiaofeizhe-zichan-hua-jiejuefangan-baipishu
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install meijia-xingye-xiaofeizhe-zichan-hua-jiejuefangan-baipishu
meijia-xingye-xiaofeizhe-zichan-hua-jiejuefangan-baipishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g meijia-xingye-xiaofeizhe-zichan-hua-jiejuefangan-baipishu
meijia-xingye-xiaofeizhe-zichan-hua-jiejuefangan-baipishu <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
